summary: This document is an email chain between Assistant United States Attorneys in the Southern District of New York, dated August 14, 2019. The correspondents are requesting and sharing documents related to the prosecution memo for the Jeffrey Epstein case (docket 19-490), including the ODAG memo and UMR from the charging phase.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: The sender and recipient of emails requesting and sharing prosecution documents related to the Epstein case (docket 19-490).

keyFacts: Email correspondence between prosecutors regarding the Epstein case occurred on August 14, 2019.
The subject involves sharing a prosecution memo and related documents for case docket 19-490.
References are made to an 'ODAG memo' and 'UMR' from the charging phase of the Epstein prosecution.
The correspondents are Assistant United States Attorneys from the Southern District of New York.
The document shows internal DOJ communication about the Epstein case materials shortly after Epstein's death.
